name: Kandidatos Kart
description:
VOTING IS BACK!
Another way of doing politics has been declared. Former presidents and vice presidents are allowed to run for the new presidency in Brazil.
Take part in the biggest racing championship among Brazilian politicians. Choose your Kandidato and win the best !!!


A STORY WITH PLOT TWIST

Get 1st place in the races to unlock championships and continue the story.


A GAME THAT WILL CHALLENGE YOU

The most challenging racing game out there !!! With artificial intelligence system that can overcome even the most experienced in racing.


CHARACTERISTICS

- Run on super-funny tracks full of traps
- Unlock more than 5 championships
- 3 game modes available
- Have fun with the 10 fictional characters, based on the Brazilian electoral candidates
- Challenge yourself !!! Artificial intelligence, with "Fuzzy" technology where the machine adapts to whoever is playing, knowing how to make decisions according to the skill of each player. Making the game as challenging as possible.
- Unique karts for each character
- And of course, have a laugh with this meme in the form of a game !!!





Help Brazilian developers!
